title: CCMod Manifest
description: Configuration file for a mod manifset file for the game CrossCode

id.title: id
id.description: ID of the mod, used for various fallbacks

title.title: title
title.description: Title of the mod, what users will see in-game

version.title: version
version.description: The version of this mod following semantic versioning (https://semver.org)

tags.title: tags
tags.description:
Array of mod tags. See the full list of official tags: 
https://github.com/krypciak/CCModDB/blob/master/CCMOD-STANDARD.md#mod-tag-list

icons.title: icons
icons.description: The icon of the mod. Currently only the 24x24 size is supported

authors.title: authors
authors.description: A list of the mod's authors

dependencies.title: dependencies
dependencies.description: The mods and versions of those mods that this mod depends on

plugin.title: plugin
plugin.description: Path of the javascript plugin file relative to mod root. This is the recommended method

preload.title: preload
preload.description: Path of the javascript preload file relative to mod root. The file will be executed at the preload loading stage

postload.title: postload
postload.description: Path of the javascript preload file relative to mod root. The file will be executed at the postload loading stage

prestart.title: prestart
prestart.description: Path of the javascript prestart file relative to mod root. The file will be executed at the prestart loading stage

poststart.title: poststart
poststart.description: Path of the javascript poststart file relative to mod root. The file will be executed at the poststart loading stage
